F_DISTANCE_OBJECT_OBJECT.question: What is the distance between the geometrical centers of <OBJECT_1> and the <OBJECT_1>?

F_DISTANCE_OBJECT_GROUND.question: What is the distance between the geometrical center of the <OBJECT> and the nearest ground element?

F_DISTANCE_OBJECT_CAMERA_DISTANCE.question: What is the distance between the geometrical center of the <OBJECT> and the camera?

F_DISTANCE_CLOSEST_OBJET_OBJECT.question: What is the distance between the geometrical center of the <OBJECT> and its closest object?
